summary: DT*:  THE CONTACT STATED THE VEHICLE WOULD NOT ACCELERATE PAST 40 MPH.  WHEN THE ACCELERATOR PEDAL WAS DEPRESSED, THE VEHICLE DID NOT ENGAGE GEARS AUTOMATICALLY.  THE PROBLEM WAS  ACCOMPANIED BY A VIBRATION IN THE STEERING WHEEL.  THE VEHICLE WAS TAKEN TO A SERVICE DEALER, WHERE SEVERAL UNSUCCESSFUL ATTEMPTS WERE MADE TO DUPLICATE THE PROBLEM.  THE MANUFACTURER WAS CONTACTED, AND REFUSED FURTHER SERVICE TO THE VEHICLE.
